title: Studio in Uptown Blocks From The Beach - 2nd Month FREE*
neighborhood: Uptown, Edgewater, Andersonville, Buena Park, Lake View
map_address: 917 W Eastwood Ave near N Sheridan Rd
posting_body: This studio apartment for rent in Uptown walking distance from the Lawrence and Wilson Red/Purple stops, CTA Bus 151, 148, 146 and 136.
Blocks away from Montrose Beach, parks, Weiss Memorial Hospital, restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, coffee shops and banks.
Easy access to Downtown Chicago, Edgewater, Lake View, Andersonville, Ravenswood, and Lincoln Square!
*2nd month rent free for qualified applicants signing a 2 year lease!
Utility package additional $76 covers heat, hot water, water and trash.
Visit our website at www.917eastwood.com for more information and similar apartments.
